name: Rock, Paper, Scissor
description: A stratagy game where a player has to choose between rock, paper, or scissors, with the winner being the player that chose the oposing option | ex: paper beats rock.

name: Tic Tac Toe
description: A basic game most people played as children first player to make 3 in a row of their corrisponding symbol ('x' or 'O') wins

name: Higher Lower
description: A simple startagy game where the player has to guess if the next number will be a higher number or lower numbther than they have
